name: Giant LÖÖP Toss
description:
It is a bright morning in off-brand Dinosaur Utopia Island, and a fresh batch of LÖÖPs have been baked. But how to take them to market? Why, with the help of Clark, your trusty Kentrosaurus of course!

Mouse to aim and toss, A and D to move left and right.

With thanks to the Paleontology Coproliteposting and The National Chronographic Society meme hub for edgy Paleoteens, and sincere apologies to James Gurney.

UPDATE : - Android versions available (note the control system is slightly different and you can't rotate around the dino, sorry! ) https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.FrostPeakGame.Loop&fbclid=IwAR...
